Dialogue.QuestOffer: G'day farmer! I'm looking for a food that can help me see better in the dark. Could you buy some seeds from the shop and grow some for me? I need 3 serves worth.
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need 3 serves of a food that helps me see better in the dark.
Dialogue.QuestHandIn: Thanks for getting that for me!

Dialogue.QuestOffer: Hi! Could you please grow 2 serves of a food that contains Vitamin C? Not strawberries though, I have lots of those.
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need 2 serves of a food with Vitamin C.
Dialogue.QuestHandIn: Thanks for getting that for me!

Dialogue.QuestOffer: Hi there farmer! I have three young children and it is really important they have strong and healthy bones and teeth! Please help me get 3 serves of a food that helps with this.
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need 3 serves of a food for healthy bones and teeth.

Dialogue.QuestOffer: How are you, farmer? I need 2 serves of a healthy, sweet snack that I can put in my children's lunchbox. My kids get sick so often, so it needs to be high in vitamin C.
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need you to grow me 2 serves of a snack food high in Vitamin C.
Dialogue.QuestHandIn: Thanks for getting those strawberries for me!

Dialogue.QuestOffer: Hi there! In winter times I struggle to get enough vitamin D. Could you visit the shop and find me 3 serves of a food that is rich in vitamin D?
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need 3 serves of a food that is high in Vitamin D. You should try talk to the shopkeeper!
Dialogue.QuestHandIn: Thankyou for getting those salmon for me!

Dialogue.QuestOffer: Hello farmer, my friend told me that wholegrain bread is much healthier than white bread. Could you get me 4 serves of wholemeal grains so I can bake healthier bread?
Dialogue.QuestInProgress: How are you going with the quest? Remember I need 4 serves of wholemeal grains. You should try talk to the shopkeeper!
Dialogue.QuestHandIn: Thanks for getting those grains farmer!
